name: WasteAttack
description:
My entry for the #TeamSeas GameJam.

WasteAttack is a game about cleaning up the ocean.
You play as a little fish who is fighting against monsters out of trash.
Sadly I couldnt finish the whole game until the GameJam ended. Because of that there are a few things missing, like a screen if you win a level or the secondary attack for the player and sometimes the player or the monster can get stuck in the level.
If I have the time I'll complete the game and update it.

Until now there is no tutorial so here is a short explanation:
In the game you need to push the rubbish into the Rubbishdisposal on the left side of the level. And you need to fight the monster made of rubbish and clear the rubbish left behind from it to win the level.

Controls:
Press Spacebar to Move into the direction your mouse is pointing.
Press Left Mouse Button for Bubble Attack.
